scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.optimize:images: magick assets/taso1.jpg -quality 85 -resize 1920x1080^ -gravity center -extent 1920x1080 assets/taso1.jpg && magick assets/headshot.png -quality 90 -resize 800x800^ -gravity center -extent 800x800 assets/headshot.png
scripts.test:performance: npm run dev & sleep 5 && npm run lighthouse && pkill -f 'python3 -m http.server'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Production build' && git push origin main
